title: League of Legends Tournament starts on 18.04.2015

embed.description: Hello Guys, I wanna start a new Tournament for fun! We play 5vs5 Draft Pick at Summoners Rift. You need min. 6 players for your team to start at this Tournament when someone don't wanna play or have no time you could also play!

body:
Hello guys,

we wanna start a Tournament! Every week is one game. The Tournament starts on 18.04.2015.

Prizes:

First Place: 3200 RIOT POINTS & Skin Triumphierender Ryze per player

Second Place: 2400 RIOT POINTS per player

Third Place: 1600 RIOT POINTS per player

Fourth Place: 800 RIOT POINTS per player

You need a team of 6 because you need one substitution when one of your team have no time.
You also can log in as solo player so you can make a team with other solo players.
Highest elo which is allowed is Gold 1.
Smurfs aren't allowed!

I hope you are interested in!

We will have a lots of fun!

Greetings The_Deient
